column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: The Municipal Court deputy prosecutor Plong Sophal on June 5
column4: decided to charge police officer Heng Heb on charges of ------stealing an ipad ------under Articles 353 and 356 of the Penal Code.------The case has now been sent to the investigating judge and the accused accused officer has been released on supervised bail until a trial date is fixed.------The speedy decision of the court today came after National Police Chief General Neth Savoeun ------ordered the police------ to prepare the case for the court to take legal action after negative reactions on Facebook when the officer was------ let off------ with a warning.
